title: Pueblo Organico
description: Reported to be an all-organic/vegetarian/vegan store. Carries dairy free ice cream, tofu burgers, mushroom chorizo, tortillas, tostadas, spirulina, moringa, snacks, bread, vegan cheese, cruelty free makeup and beauty supplies.
streetAddress: Plaza Paseo La Rioja C104, Carretera Nacional 5000, Col La Rioja
